original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph WHERE c.UserId = ph.UserId AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=1 AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-14 11:59:07' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 1 AND postHistory.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-14 11:59:07'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.UserId)
